channel.title: Sharing With The World --- Please Help
channel.description: Ok guys I need some experts here or some beginners luck with this question. First off I went into the moparscape folder and went into hybridscape folder and did drop changes monsters name changes spawns health lvl and shops and such. The problem is... how do I share it with the world? I know about hamachi and no-ip but how does it all connect?

item.title: Sharing With The World --- Please Help
item.dc:creator: @King124 King124
item.description:
@King124 wrote:

server ip like to log into mopar with so people can use to play my server

Read full topic
item.source: Sharing With The World --- Please Help

item.title: Sharing With The World --- Please Help
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]This is the most basic thing you need to know-HYBRIDSCAPE DOESN’T LET OTHER PEOPLE ON!.

If you have your server set up correctly, don’t have a firewall running, don’t have a router blocking your ports, etc…hybridscape works fine for multiplayer.[/quote]

Oh,ok.Anyways I already have a server with like 1-2 people on per day,it’s working fine,based on ultimate PK.BTW ty for the info.
I still like my server though

quote:How do I check witch IP I have?. PLease state witch IP please.Witch-as in router IP,internet protocall,or server IP.

Read full topic
item.source: Sharing With The World --- Please Help

item.title: Sharing With The World --- Please Help
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

This is the most basic thing you need to know-HYBRIDSCAPE DOESN'T LET OTHER PEOPLE ON!.

If you have your server set up correctly, don’t have a firewall running, don’t have a router blocking your ports, etc…hybridscape works fine for multiplayer.

Read full topic

item.title: Sharing With The World --- Please Help
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

This is the most basic thing you need to know-HYBRIDSCAPE DOESN’T LET OTHER PEOPLE ON!.

If you go on other servers,you see they use Ultimate PK,phonescape,pimpscape,testscape.

Download a source-In example,:Ultimate PK,phonescape,pimpscape,testscape.
Then do what you have,and put it online.People shoudl come.Also,check out this guide on how to spawn NPCs and items.http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,59865.msg726541.html#msg726541

This one on how to create a server-http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html

Hope I helped. .

Read full topic
